definition: the act or process of complicating
details:
noun
- the act or process of complicating
- puzzling complexity
= synonyms: complicatedness, knottiness, tortuousness
- a development that complicates a situation
= synonyms: ramification
- a situation or condition that is complex or confused
= example: a situation or condition that is complex or confused
- any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of (or because of) another disease
= example: any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of (or because of) another disease
